title: Fedora 9 vs Ubuntu 8.04
excerpt: PCWorld Australia has pitted Fedora 9 against Ubuntu 8.04 in an interesting article showing each one’s strengths and weaknesses. PCWorld’s article concludes: For users who are already familiar with Linux, Fedora 9 is an excellent choice.
